oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Armistice Day Parade, Nashville, Tennessee, 1941 March 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Armistice Day Parade in downtown Nashville, Tennessee on March 18, 1941. The ceremonies and parades were in commemoration of the armistice signed between the Allies of World War I and Germany at Compiègne, France, for the cessation of hostilities on the Western Front of World War I. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: War Memorial Building (Nashville, Tenn.); Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.)
